Class AllProjects

java.lang.Object
InputChecks
AllProjects
public class AllProjects
extends InputChecks
The Allprojects class contains all the methods for the Project Management System for 'PoisePMS'. It inherits input check methods from the superclass 'InputChecks' to validate user input.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    AllProjects()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addProject​(java.sql.Statement statement)
    This method will create a new project, which is added to the 'main_project_info' table in the PoisePMS database.
    void editProject​(java.sql.Statement statement)
    This method allows users to edit project information, relating to the project due date and total amount paid.
    void finaliseProject​(java.sql.Statement statement)
    Project Management System for Poised.
    void findProject​(java.sql.Statement statement)
    This method allows users to find project from the main_project_info table in the external 'PoisePMS' database by either entering the project name or number.
    void printAllFromTable​(java.sql.Statement statement)
    This method displays all information from the main_project_info table in the 'PoisePMS' database
    void viewIncomplete​(java.sql.Statement statement)
    This method allows users to view all projects that are incomplete in the main_project_info table in the external 'Poise' database.
    void viewOverdue​(java.sql.Statement statement)
    This method allows users to view all projects that are overdue in the main_prject_info table in the external 'PoisePMS' database.

    • AllProjects

      public AllProjects()

  • Method Details

    • viewIncomplete

      public void viewIncomplete​(java.sql.Statement statement) throws java.sql.SQLException
      This method allows users to view all projects that are incomplete in the main_project_info table in the external 'Poise' database.

      Parameters:
      statement - statement object linked to connection to perform SQL commands
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - occurs if there is an error accessing the database information

    • editProject

      public void editProject​(java.sql.Statement statement) throws java.sql.SQLException
      This method allows users to edit project information, relating to the project due date and total amount paid.

      It displays a sub-menu to the user with two edit choices and executes the action depending on their choice. The edited information is then written under the corresponding column of the 'main_project_info' table in the external PoisePMS database.

      Parameters:
      statement - statement object linked to connection to perform SQL commands
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - occurs if there is an error accessing the database information

    • finaliseProject

      public void finaliseProject​(java.sql.Statement statement) throws java.sql.SQLException
      Project Management System for Poised. FinaliseProject class for finaliseProject() method located in the main_project_info table in the external 'PoisePMS' database.

      Will generating an invoice, if requirements are met and marking the project as finalised by adding a completion date to the project info. After that it will mark project as finalised and adds a completion date. Finalised project will be stored in the external database.

      Parameters:
      statement - statement object linked to connection to perform SQL commands
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - occurs if there is an error accessing the database information

    • addProject

      public void addProject​(java.sql.Statement statement) throws java.sql.SQLException
      This method will create a new project, which is added to the 'main_project_info' table in the PoisePMS database.

      User can enter info based on what is displayed to the user which connects it to the database and updates project. The 'MainMenu' class calls on this method when user wants to add a new project.

      Parameters:
      statement - statement object linked to connection to perform SQL commands
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - occurs if there is an error accessing the database information

    • viewOverdue

      public void viewOverdue​(java.sql.Statement statement) throws java.sql.SQLException, java.text.ParseException
      This method allows users to view all projects that are overdue in the main_prject_info table in the external 'PoisePMS' database.

      Parameters:
      statement - statement object linked to connection to perform SQL commands
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - occurs if there is an error accessing the database information
      java.text.ParseException - occurs if a date string is in the wrong format to be parsed

    • findProject

      public void findProject​(java.sql.Statement statement) throws java.sql.SQLException
      This method allows users to find project from the main_project_info table in the external 'PoisePMS' database by either entering the project name or number.

      Using either name or number, from external database and displayed.

      Parameters:
      statement - statement object linked to connection to perform SQL commands
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - occurs if there is an error accessing the database information

    • printAllFromTable

      public void printAllFromTable​(java.sql.Statement statement) throws java.sql.SQLException
      This method displays all information from the main_project_info table in the 'PoisePMS' database

      Parameters:
      statement - statement object linked to connection to perform SQL commands
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - occurs if there is an error accessing the database information
